Object creation & Value assignment
```{r}
a=25
b=30
```

Command line Interface
```{r}
b
```

Object need not be explicitly defined
```{r}
c=45
class(c)
d=TRUE
class(d)
```
Simple Mathematical Operations:

1) Addition
```{r}
a+b
```
2)Subtraction
```{r}
b-a
```
3) Division
```{r}
b/a
```
4) Multiplication
```{r}
b*a
```
5) Square root
```{r}
sqrt(a)
```
6) Power
```{r}
a^3
```
7)logarithm 
```{r}
log(a,base=exp(1))
```
8) Factorial
```{r}
factorial(a)
```
